title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan together in a bowl.
Mix spaghetti with bacon and egg mixture.
Season with salt and pepper, then serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 2 hours.
Prepare the sauce by frying spices in butter.
Add cream and grilled chicken to the sauce.
Simmer for 10 minutes, then serve with rice or naan.
